sentence.text: No significant associations were detected between these SNPs and schizophrenia in Han Chinese and the positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production data set.

entity.text: positive regulation of antibacterial peptide production

sentence.text: However, we observed nominal significant associations of 2 SNPs in the apoptotic mitochondrial changes gene and 4 SNPs in the response to oxidative stress gene with early onset schizophrenia (protein homooligomerization), but none of these associations survived the Bonferroni correction.
